column1: Uchi////I would give Uchi 5 star because I love EVERYTHING about this place but they have made some changes recently. I went to uchi a few weeks ago and was surprised to notice that the ham and egg roll and the fried milk recipes had changed. Don't get me wrong
column2: they are still great however I'm a "if it's not broken
column3: don't fix it" kind of chick. Anyway
column6: and the food is to die for. My favorites: Brussel sprouts
